gilt-edged.translation[0].definitions[0]: gilt-edged stocks or shares do not give you much interest (=additional money) but are considered very safe as they are sold mainly by governments
gilt-edged.translation[1].definitions[0]: gilt-edged investments are the safest available, usually in government bonds
The safest place to put your money is with the government. Over hundreds of years, the government has never defaulted on gilt-edged bonds.
